name: video-converter
description: A Bun/Node CLI to convert videos using FFmpeg

scripts.both: bun run webm && bun run mp4
scripts.mp4:preset: bun run build && bun dist/video-converter.js --format=mp4 -- -c:v libx264 -b:v 2.5M -maxrate 2.5M -bufsize 5M -crf 28 -preset slow -vf "scale='min(1920,iw)':'min(1080,ih)':force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,setsar=1,pad=ceil(iw/2)*2:ceil(ih/2)*2" -r 30 -c:a aac -b:a 128k
scripts.webm:preset: bun run build && bun dist/video-converter.js --format=webm -- -c:v libvpx-vp9 -b:v 1.5M -crf 32 -vf "scale='min(1920,iw)':'min(1080,ih)':force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,setsar=1,pad=ceil(iw/2)*2:ceil(ih/2)*2" -r 30 -c:a libopus -b:a 96k
scripts.both:preset: bun run mp4:preset && bun run webm:preset
